name: Cubes-An FPS
description:
Cubes-An FPS

A small game made by me in 2 days. Only out for MAC for now. 

 This is an EARLY VERSION. I'm currently working on a later version with more features. These include grass in the desert, more bases and new enemys.

CONTROLS:

W/A/S/D: Move

Mouse: Look

Number keys: Switch guns

LMB: Fire

F: Show frames per second
